name: Office Rush (byDan)
description:
Made for the Boss rush jam 2023

Gather resources, craft makeshift weapons and defeat your bosses, like literally.

You are the new intern, make your way thought your new job and defeat your bosses.
Do you have the resourcefulness and the conviction to become the new C.E.O.?

Controls
Move: WASD
Aim :   MOUSE
Shoot/Kick : MBL-MBR
Drop Weapons: Z-X
Drop Gun Parts: 1-2-3

You can also use a GamePad (Details in the game)

Please consider suporting my game development endeavours
